statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={156.7}{e}^{{{0.0261}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0261}}\approx{1.0264435877002}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0264435877002}-{1}={0.026443587700165}\approx{0.0264} and the percent is 2.64.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
